name: pages-functions-with-wasm-demo
description: A demo app that exemplifies wasm module imports in Pages Functions

scripts.dev: nodemon --watch app-web/src --ext "html,scss,js,mjs,ts,json" -x "yarn build:app-web && npx wrangler pages dev public/dist "
scripts.build:app-web: rm -rf public/dist && parcel build app-web/src/*.html --dist-dir public/dist
scripts.publish:to-pages: yarn build:app-web && npx wrangler pages publish public/dist
